title: Dark.Souls.II.Crown.of.the.Old.Iron.King-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                 Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King 

    Release Date :  8/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : RPG 

   

    "DARK SOULST II Crown of the Old Iron King" is the second of 3 large-
        scale DLC additions to DARK SOULST II, and includes all-new stages,
        maps, boss characters, weapons & armor! In this second DLC, players
        will find themselves in a world shrouded in ash. Can you find and
        recover the lost crown? 

    

   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
   - Play 

    Notes: As the game files completely updated, we've decided to make this
           release a standalone, which includes newest DLC, pre-order DLCs,
                   Crown of the Sunken King DLC and the main game updated to 1.05
                   version. 

           Savegames from RELOADED main release are compatible. 

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
